mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tdsitenum AS "tdsitenum", a.tddate AS "tddate", a.tddisplay AS "tddisplay", a.tdperson AS "tdperson", a.tdremark AS "tdremark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_transit_copymeterinfo( id, tdsitenum, tddate, tddisplay, tdperson, tdremark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tdsitenum}, #{tddate}, #{tddisplay}, #{tdperson}, #{tdremark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_transit_copymeterinfo SET tdsitenum = #{tdsitenum}, tddate = #{tddate}, tddisplay = #{tddisplay}, tdperson = #{tdperson}, tdremark = #{tdremark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
